name: Xiaodong Gu 0002
content: Xiaodong GU's Homepage Xiaodong GU Associate Professor School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University Contact: Room 1208, Software Building, No.800 Dongchuan Road, Shanghai, China Email: Research Interest: My research focuses on large language models for natural and programming languages. I develop efficient machine learning methodologies for software code. My research topics are: Large Language Models Program Generation Intelligent Software Engineering Github Selected Publications [Full List] [Google Scholar] Anti-Adversarial Learning: Desensitizing Prompts for Large Language Models Xuan Li, Zhe Yin, Xiaodong Gu, and Beijun Shen In Proceedings of the 40th Annual AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2026). Singapore, Jan 20 - 27, 2026.
